catalog_info.title: The Neurobiology of Pain
catalog_info.description: This course will explore the neurobiological systems and mechanisms underlying both acute and chronic pain. Topics will include nociceptive/sensory systems, molecular basis and modulation of pain, neuroanatomy of peripheral and central pain circuits, pain pathologies, pharmacological and non pharmacological treatments.  The emphasis will be on understanding basic neurobiological concepts underlying pain systems and reading/discussing the primary scientific research in the field.
